mapper.sql: m.INS_ID, m.MCHNT_ID, m.MCHNT_TYPE, m.MCHNT_NAME, m.MCHNT_CODE, m.BUS_LICENCE_CODE, m.NAME, m.ID_CARD_NO, m.PHONE_NUMBER, m.BACK_NAME, m.BACK_ACT, m.BACK_ACT_NAME, m.INS_SCALE, m.BRAND_NAME, m.INS_CODE_CARD, m.BUSINESS_LICENCE, m.ID_CARD, m.BRAND_LOGO, m.DATA_STAT, m.INVITE_CODE, m.INVITE_CODE_STAT, m.REMARKS, m.CREATE_USER, m.UPDATE_USER, m.CREATE_TIME, m.UPDATE_TIME, m.LOCK_VERSION
mapper.select:

FROM TB_MERCHANT_INF_LIST m WHERE m.MCHNT_ID=#{mchntId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MERCHANT_INF_LIST ( INS_ID, MCHNT_ID, MCHNT_TYPE, MCHNT_NAME, MCHNT_CODE, BUS_LICENCE_CODE, NAME, ID_CARD_NO, PHONE_NUMBER, BACK_NAME, BACK_ACT, BACK_ACT_NAME, INS_SCALE, BRAND_NAME, INS_CODE_CARD, BUSINESS_LICENCE, ID_CARD, BRAND_LOGO, DATA_STAT, INVITE_CODE, INVITE_CODE_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{insId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busLicenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backAct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backActName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insCodeCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteCodeStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MERCHANT_INF_LIST SET INS_ID=#{insId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHNT_TYPE=#{mchntType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHNT_NAME=#{mchntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHNT_CODE=#{mchntCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_LICENCE_CODE=#{busLicenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_NO=#{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER=#{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_NAME=#{backName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_ACT=#{backAct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_ACT_NAME=#{backActName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INS_SCALE=#{insScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_NAME=#{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INS_CODE_CARD=#{insCodeCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_LICENCE=#{businessLicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD=#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_LOGO=#{brandLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STAT=#{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVITE_CODE=#{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVITE_CODE_STAT=#{inviteCodeStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, LOCK_VERSION=LOCK_VERSION+1 WHERE MCHNT_Id = #{mchntId}

SELECT
FROM TB_MERCHANT_INF_LIST m WHERE m.INVITE_CODE=#{id}
